com.tomansill.redis.lock

Class RedisReadWriteLock

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tomansill.redis.lock.RedisReadWriteLock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReadWriteLock

    public class RedisReadWriteLock
extends Object
implements ReadWriteLock
    RedisReadWriteLock class The ReadWriteLock implements ReadWriteLock's methods and returns read and write locks.
    Author:
    Tom Ansill

    • Constructor Detail

      • RedisReadWriteLock

        public RedisReadWriteLock(String lockpoint,
                          AbstractRedisClient client)
        Creates an instance of RedisReadWriteLock
        Parameters:
        lockpoint - lockpoint for this lock to claim on Redis server
        client - Redis client
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - thrown when either lockpoint or client parameter is null

      • RedisReadWriteLock

        public RedisReadWriteLock(String lockpoint,
                          AbstractRedisClient client,
                          boolean is_fair)
        Creates an instance of RedisReadWriteLock
        Parameters:
        lockpoint - lockpoint for this lock to claim on Redis server
        client - Redis client
        is_fair - true to enforce fair locking order, false to let locks to acquire in unspecified way
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - thrown when either lockpoint or client parameter is null
        UnsupportedOperationException - thrown when the given AbstractRedisClient instance does not support this fairness policy

        public boolean isFair()
        Returns the fairness flag
        Returns:
        true if this RedisReadWriteLock is fair, false otherwise
